transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan madam boliye.
Executive: Sir, main keh rahi thi aapka issue to maine Vijay sir se pura sari cheeze resolve karwa di thi. Abhi aapko.
Customer: Haan, wo unhone bola ki Jio mein thoda problem hai.
Executive: Haan sir, wohi mujhe lag hi raha tha.
Customer: Haan madam boliye.
Executive: Haan ji sir, to main wohi keh rahi thi aapka na yaha pe sir ek concern open ho gaya tha to ab main usko close kar rahi hu.
Customer: Dekho kya ho raha hai, Airtel se Airtel pe chal raha hai aur Jio mein nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Abhi to lekin sir chalne laga hai na.
Customer: Wo koi issue hoga main wohi aapko keh rahi thi.
Executive: To abhi for the mean while sir main aapka na ye concern close kar de rahi hu. To aapke paas na mere liye ek feedback mail jayega us pe aap please revert kar dijiyega.
Customer: Haan mujhe bolo, mujhe main mujhe kya karna hai main wohi karunga.
Executive: Main bas ye aapka ticket close karungi na to aapke paas mere feedback ke liye ek mail jayega us pe aap satisfied mark kar dena.
Customer: Okay, theek hai main karta hu.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
Customer: Haan, theek hai main karta hu.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Executive: Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Executive: Please stay on the line.
summary:
Concerns:

- Jio network not working.

- Wants to know what to do.



Resolution:

- Executive informed issue has been resolved.

- Executive is closing the concern.

- Executive asked to provide feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- network issue, feedback, resolution
